channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Best Travel Strollers for All Your Family Adventures (2025)
item.description: Whether you’re on a road trip or a plane ride, these are our favorite travel strollers that fold as flat as possible.

item.title: Ford to reveal more about its new low-cost electric vehicles on August 11
item.description: Jim Farley, Ford's CEO, has touted this as a "Model T moment" -- but the first of these new EVs won't come out until 2027.

item.title: 8 Best Video Doorbell Cameras (2025): Smart, Battery, AI, Budget, and Subscription-Free
item.description: Never miss a delivery. These WIRED-tested picks will help you keep tabs on your front door from anywhere.

item.title: The Inside Story of Eric Trump’s American Bitcoin
item.description: A new crypto mining company is flexing the Trump name and connections to get ahead.

item.title: ChatGPT: Everything you need to know about the AI-powered chatbot
item.description: A timeline of ChatGPT product updates and releases, starting with the latest, which we’ve been updating throughout the year.

item.title: The Best Cheap Headphones We’ve Tried

item.title: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs
item.description: A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2024.

item.title: OpenAI to launch AI data center in Norway, its first in Europe
item.description: OpenAI said the new Norway-based datacenter comes as the European Union races to achieve AI sovereignty by investing in data center and compute power.
